title: Miss Fortune Buff?
body: I really like to play{{champion:21}}  she was one of my best champs,but she cant handle champions like{{champion:421}} or other champs with good engages({{champion:80}},{{champion:92}} {{champion:106}} ) I would be very very glad and happy if {{champion:21}} can get a buff for example her E can give her movement speed if she hits an enemy or her passive gets a little rework.I hope meanwhile the season she can get a buff like that. Tell me which ideas you have to balance her.

replies.body:
she get an rework at the moment.

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/page/champion-update/miss-fortune-struts-pbe

If this will buff her, idk we will see.
This is the german board, pls post it in the english board again :D
